sn12.70:5.1: Api pana → api nu (bj, sya-all, km)
sn12.70:29.1: paṭisaṃvediyetha → paṭisaṃvedayetha (bj, sya-all); patisaṃvediyetha vā na vā paṭisaṃvediyetha (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
sn12.70:30.6: dasamo susimena cāti → dasamo vutto susīmenāti (bj); dasamo vutto susimenāti (sya-all); dasamo susīmena cāti (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
